price: 4 Nous pourrons au contraire reconstituer jusqu’à ses phalanges.
arabic: بَلَىٰ قَٰدِرِينَ عَلَىٰٓ أَن نُّسَوِّيَ بَنَانَهُۥ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: balā qādirīna ʿalā an nusawwiya banānahu
